root.name: Rent-a-Hero
root.description: Rent-a-Hero is your typical point and click adventure game. You point and click your way out of problems, by going west, south, north and east. The games visuals consist of 2d backgrounds with all character models in 3d. (See below) The character Rodrigo talking to a a NPC.

similar_games.game: Tales of Monkey Island Chapter 1: Launch of the Screaming Narwhal
